channel.title: Replacing radio object with row of buttons + midi feedback
channel.description: I want to replace a radio object with a row of buttons on my midi controller. The row goes up chromatically, so getting out the integer value I want to have is no problem. I'm struggling now with the midi feedback. I want only the the button coresponding to the selceted value to light up. This is what I got so far: I got no reaction, no midi feedback what I don't really get. Oh and I tried different midi out objects that's why I have note and notehold.

item.title: Replacing radio object with row of buttons + midi feedback
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

Ah got. Ah toggle with delayed pulse on the set was the solution.

Bildschirmfoto 2016-11-30 um 16.07.28.png1502x390 45.3 KB

I find the midi out object really confusing. Isn't a midi note message only note value + velocity (and velocity >0 on and <0 off?) I thought that the trigger was just to tell the object somehting happened but it seems to have the function of the velocity. Isn't that a bit double?

P.S. And apparently you should not feed the velo output 64, it didn't work, it should have 1.

Read full topic
item.source: Replacing radio object with row of buttons + midi feedback

item.title: Replacing radio object with row of buttons + midi feedback

item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

I want to replace a radio object with a row of buttons on my midi controller. The row goes up chromatically, so getting out the integer value I want to have is no problem.
I'm struggling now with the midi feedback. I want only the the button coresponding to the selceted value to light up.

This is what I got so far:

Bildschirmfoto 2016-11-30 um 15.46.33.png1336x760 92.3 KB

I got no reaction, no midi feedback what I don't really get.

Oh and I tried different midi out objects that's why I have note and notehold.
